author: hossman
msg: SOLR-3918: Fixed the 'dist-war-excl-slf4j' ant target to exclude all slf4j jars, so that the resulting war is usable as is provided the servlet container includes the correct slf4j api and impl jars (merge r1421411)

author: hossman
msg: SOLR-3918: Fixed the 'dist-war-excl-slf4j' ant target to exclude all slf4j jars, so that the resulting war is usable as is provided the servlet container includes the correct slf4j api and impl jars.
